article_title: The Recession Started It; Colleges Sustain It; And Politicians Make It Worse

article_metadata.description: A significant portion of the $1.3 trillion in student debt can be attributed to tuition inflation pushed along by the flood of student loan money in recent years.
article_metadata.author: Chuck DeVore

og.description: A significant portion of the $1.3 trillion in student debt can be attributed to tuition inflation pushed along by the flood of student loan money in recent years.
